attributes.action: Investigate Tony Blair for Possible War Crimes
attributes.additional_details: The servicemen killed on both sides and the huge civilian death toll was unnecessary, as there was No Weapons of Mass Destruction found. theres were still peaceful avenues to be explored before war was ultimately necessary. The reprocussions are still being felt with the Middle East in dissarray today.
attributes.background:
In 2003, A decision was undertaken to Invade Iraq. This was after Falsified, flawed or untrue Intelligence was submitted, that would lead all those concerned to believe that Weapons of Mass Destruction existed and where being stored and made in Iraq
The resulting war directly lead to 250,000 deaths

rejection.details: Criminal investigations are a matter for the police. Decisions about investigations must be taken independently of the Government or Parliament.
